justification: The Offering refers to 'The Ring is trying to get back to its master' and the Interfaces describe a pirate captain's attire, neither of which provide any indication of the ability to create an interactive or augmented real-world environment as required by the Ability statement.
ability: The ability to provide an interactive experience of a real-world environment where the objects that reside in the real world are enhanced by computer-generated perceptual information such as visual, auditory, haptic etc.  environment.
